# clear-cli [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/sindresorhus/clear-cli.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/sindresorhus/clear-cli)

> Clear the terminal cross-platform


## Install

```
$ npm install --global clear-cli
```


## Usage

```
$ clear --help

  Usage
    $ clear
```
